sentence.Network_en: There she was , grey - suited , sweet - faced , demure, but scowling.
sentence.Network_cn: 她就在那里, 穿着灰色的衣服, 漂亮的脸上显得严肃而忧郁.

sentence.Network_en: He faced the press, initially, in a somewhat subdued mood.
sentence.Network_cn: 他最初面对媒体时情绪有点忧郁。

sentence.Network_en: There are few things quite as sweet as revenge.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎没有比复仇更爽的事情了。

list.abs: I joked on him , " I cannot see a sweet smiling face here any more . "我笑着问，“都看不见甜美的笑脸了。”
